job.jobname: 11.3 - EG: Update delivery date purchase order

step.datasource:
WITH del_dates AS ( SELECT DISTINCT t.purchase_ordernr , CAST(DATEADD(DAY, 70, r.mfd_date) as date) as afldat FROM dbo._AB_tb_TransfersOrders t WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_tb_TransfersAbsenceIdReg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.absenceid = t.absenceid WHERE 1=1 AND r.marked_for_delivery = 1 ) SELECT oh.ordernr as HeaderID , oh.ordernr , ol.ID , d.afldat
--, oh.afldat as header_afldat_old , ol.afldat as line_afldat_old FROM del_dates d INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_US_orkrg oh WITH (NOLOCK) ON oh.ordernr = d.purchase_ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND oh.afgehandld = 0 INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_US_orsrg ol WITH (NOLOCK) ON ol.ordernr = oh.ordernr AND ol.uitgifte = 0 WHERE d.afldat > oh.afldat OR d.afldat > ol.afldat
